text: niccayamāka, nirākarippavarkaḷ taṅkaḷ poruḷkaḷai (makkaḷ) allāhvuṭaiya vaḻiyil celvatait taṭai ceyya celavu ceykiṉṟaṉar. Avarkaḷ mēlum, ivvāṟē celavu ceyvārkaḷ, muṭivil atu avarkaḷukkē tukkamāka ēṟpaṭṭuviṭum! Piṉṉar avarkaḷ tōṟkaṭikkappaṭṭu veṟṟi koḷḷappaṭuvārkaḷ. (Ippaṭippaṭṭa) nirākarippavarkaḷ (maṟumaiyil) narakattiṉ pakkamē ōṭṭic cellappaṭuvārkaḷ
